fields_data.name: Soul Devourer
fields_data.storyBackground:
In retrospect, it was he who summoned a great number of spirits in the graveyard and wanted to conduct thorough research on them.
However, it was unfortunate that something went wrong and his soul was caught by the magic circle.
Drifting in the vast sea of souls, no other soul except him was able to stay sober and sane.
He once tried to rouse them from chaos and then dug into their memories, but all these were in vain. An everlasting fierce howl echoed to his ears and time became pointless.
On the brink of collapse, the initial issue popped into his mind - where's the root, where's the destiny?
He made up his mind eventually by deciding to shake off the chains and being free.
A whirlpool appeared in the sea of souls. At the eye of the whirlpool was him, who was absorbing the energy of souls.
His body had become a statue after 42 years passed, but today after absorbing the whole energy of the sea, he was finally reborn.
Rebirth and the powerful strength of souls within his body made him unstable and emotional. He started forgetting everything including his original intention and was unable to use the power.
It’s time to embark on the journey to find himself!
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: Drains 15 mana from an enemy piece every second for 4 seconds. Then, transfers all his mana to 1 random allied piece, reducing their CD time by 2 second if their ability is on cooldown.
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: Drains 25 mana from an enemy piece every second for 3 seconds. Then, transfers all his mana to 2 random allied pieces, reducing their CD time by 4 second if their ability is on cooldown.
fields_data.threestarChessSkill: Drains 45 mana from an enemy piece every second for 2 seconds. Then, transfers all his mana to 3 random allied piece, reducing their CD time by 6 second if their ability is on cooldown.

fields_data.name: Lava Shaman
fields_data.storyBackground:
Among the Cave Clan, the spokesperson of the mother god is indispensable, the meaning of the Shaman lies here. In order to establish communication with the power of the greatest, every Shaman must have a unique set of communication skills. 
Lava believes that the magma represents the true emotion of the mother god hidden under the surface. Under the deep cave and beside the tumbling blood, the Lava Shaman listened, felt, and thought about the pulsations from the earth.

fields_data.name: Ghost Kid
fields_data.storyBackground:
Paul had been Sigma City's patrol officer for five years, and he had seen many creepy things at night. He had seen freak stranger wearing capes and creeping around the rooftops, and the merchant who sold exotic bats, that accidentally got killed by his cargo. However, it was the first time Paul had seen a child wandering alone in the alley at midnight. It seemed that anything could happen in this dangerous part of town, it was crowded with extremists from various factions.
Paul was in a dark alley, barely lit by the streetlight in the corner. He could only recognize the child's approximate age and height from the outline. He guessed that the girl ran out of the house for some reason. She was scared, and her body was shaking. The girl also held a distorted, strangely shaped balloon. Paul was wondering whether he could find any clues by looking at this balloon.
"Are you lost, little girl?" Paul leaned down, trying not to scare her. The balloon in the girl's hand slowly floated towards him.
" Brother, shall we play together? The little girl looked cheerful, and didn't feel like she was in a dangerous place.
Paul was relieved, perhaps she was just lost. He started to blame her parents for being so careless, and didn’t realize that the creepy balloon was getting closer and closer to him.
"What's your father's name? Where do you live? I'll take you back." Paul saw the little girl's appearance. She had silver hair, her deep blue eyes expressing a child's unique innocence, but her skin was pale and cold like the moonlight.
Paul recognized her father's name from the little girl's response, a name that had frequently appeared on the headlines of newspapers recently. However, the person with this name had already turned into ashes, the whole family was killed in a fire. According to his colleagues who investigated the case, the deceased never had a daughter.
Before Paul could respond, the balloon in the little girl's hand was already in front of him. It turned out to be a living creature - a big head with a large and distorted mouth. It peered at him with its one, horrifying eye.
Paul wanted to scream for help, but an inexplicable fear blocked his throat, he couldn't shout aloud! In his panic, he recalled a robbery that occurred a few blocks away not long ago. The victim claimed that he had been knocked unconscious due to a head injury. When he woke up, all of his belongings were missing. The strange thing was that the victim lost all of his happy memories afterward. The other police officers had a good laugh about this case. At this moment, Paul felt the big head gnawing at his body, its maw enveloping and restricting him. Try as he might, he could not free himself from its grasp. Before Paul lost consciousness, he felt that something was being seized from his body...
"Don't eat too much." The little girl said, which was obviously not meant for the poor security officer who was already knocked unconscious. The big head ignored her, succumbing to its monstrous glutton and greed, its appetite being satiated by taking all the happy memories away from Paul.
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: Anna throws the Big Head to the farthest enemy, dragging the target back to her and dealing 200 Physical Damage. If the target is dragged to be within 1 grid around Anna, deals a total of 150 Magical Damage over 3 times, and stuns the target for 4.5 seconds.

fields_data.name: Thorn Predator
fields_data.storyBackground:
Hunger, fear, despair. When it comes to the terrifying thing that never stops hunting in the desert, the talkative adventurers in the bar will tacitly lower their voices or even keep silent.
Thorn Predator, a deadly threat hidden in the desert. His horror stems from his purity-pure predatory instincts and cruel actions.
He moved with his claw feet and ambushed all prey that entered its predator range with sharp spikes day and night.
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: The Predator activates a Thorn Shell which can reflect and disable the damage received (each attacker can only be applied once), and stun the attacker for 1 seconds. The Thorn Shell lasts for 4 seconds.
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: The Predator activates a Thorn Shell which can reflect and disable the damage received (each attacker can only be applied once), and stun the attacker for 1.5 seconds. The Thorn Shell lasts for 5 seconds.
fields_data.threestarChessSkill: The Predator activates a Thorn Shell which can reflect and disable the damage received (each attacker can only be applied once), and stun the attacker for 2.5 seconds. The Thorn Shell lasts for 6 seconds.

fields_data.name: Spider Queen
fields_data.storyBackground:
Ungoliant Morales is a rare individual with perfect leader ability among the Insectoid. After her subversive reforms, the group not only was not annihilated by other groups but also ushered in unprecedented prosperity.
While holding the absolute dominance at the top of the Insectoid in her hand, she also gave wisdom to the bottom outstanding people generously. 
Because of this, her group was able to become the most powerful force in the Insectoid.
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: Weave a web that lasts 4 seconds. The enemies on the web cannot move and 40% of their Base attack can be evaded. If the enemy dies during the effect, a small spider will be summoned.
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: Weave a web that lasts 6 seconds. The enemies on the web cannot move and 60% of their Base attack can be evaded. If the enemy dies during the effect, a small spider will be summoned.
fields_data.threestarChessSkill: Weave a web that lasts 10 seconds. The enemies on the web cannot move and 100% of their Base attack can be evaded. If the enemy dies during the effect, a small spider will be summoned.

fields_data.name: Berserker
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: With each continuous blow on the same target, gaining a bonus of 15% attack speed up to 6 stacks. After changing targets, the stacks drop to zero.
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: With each continuous blow on the same target, gaining a bonus of 20% attack speed up to 9 stacks. After changing targets, the stacks drop to zero.
fields_data.threestarChessSkill: With each continuous blow on the same target, gaining a bonus of 25 %attack speed up to 12 stacks. After changing targets, the stacks drop to zero.

fields_data.name: Shining Assassin
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: Gain 5 times of avoidance effects and 40 bonus to damage, last for 6 seconds.
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: Gain 7 times of avoidance effects and 60 bonus to damage, last for 6 seconds.
fields_data.threestarChessSkill: Gain 9 times of avoidance effects and 80 bonus to damage, last for 6 seconds.

fields_data.name: Razorclaw
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: Summon a spirit bear with its attack has a 20% chance to entangle an enemy unit for 3 seconds.
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: Summon a strong spirit bear with its attack has a 20%  chance to entangle an enemy unit for 3 seconds.
fields_data.threestarChessSkill: Summon a stronger spirit bear with its attack has a 20% chance to entangle an enemy unit for 3 seconds.

fields_data.name: Dragon Knight
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: Transforms into a powerful dragon form, granting additional 2 grids of attack range and 100 attack damages. Normal attack deals consitent magical damage.
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: Transforms into a powerful dragon form, granting additional 2 grids of attack range and 150 attack damages. Normal attack deals consitent magical damage.
fields_data.threestarChessSkill: Transforms into a powerful dragon form, granting additional 2 grids of attack range and 200 attack damages. Normal attack deals consitent magical damage.

fields_data.name: Siren
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: During 3 seconds, any enemy units in 4 radius looking at Siren will have their attack speed slowed for 30%. If 2 seconds of total time is accumulated looking at Siren, that piece will turn to stone for 2 seconds.
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: During 4 seconds, any enemy units in 6 radius looking at Siren will have their attack speed slowed for 30%. If 2 seconds of total time is accumulated looking at Siren, that piece will turn to stone for 2.5 seconds.
fields_data.threestarChessSkill: During 5 seconds, any enemy units in 7  radius looking at Siren will have their attack speed slowed for 30%. If 2 seconds of total time is accumulated looking at Siren, that piece will turn to stone for 3 seconds.

fields_data.name: Storm Shaman
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: Creates a damaging static storm that also silence enemy units in the area for 2 seconds. Dealing as maximum as 150 magical damages per second.
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: Creates a damaging static storm that also silence enemy units in the area for 3 seconds. Dealing as maximum as 200 magical damages per second.
fields_data.threestarChessSkill: Creates a damaging static storm that also silence enemy units in the area for 4 seconds. Dealing as maximum as 250 magical damages per second.

fields_data.name: Venomancer
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: Generates acid mist for 15 seconds that reduces the enemy Armor by 7 if affected by the mist. Meanwhile, enters a chemically induced rage that reduces basic attack cooldown to 0.7, and restores HP by 50 every second for 60 seconds.
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: Generates acid mist for 15 seconds that reduces the enemy Armor by 7 if affected by the mist. Meanwhile, enters a chemically induced rage that reduces basic attack cooldown to 0.55, and restores HP by 75 every second for 60 seconds.
fields_data.threestarChessSkill: Generates acid mist for 15 seconds that reduces the enemy Armor by 10 if affected by the mist. Meanwhile, enters a chemically induced rage that reduces basic attack cooldown to 0.4, and restores HP by 100 every second for 60 seconds.

fields_data.name: Pirate Captain
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: Summon a ghostly ship smashes the target area, causing 1  seconds of stunning and 150 damages.
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: Summon a ghostly ship smashes the target area, causing 1.5  seconds of stunning and 250 damages.
fields_data.threestarChessSkill: Summon a ghostly ship smashes the target area, causing 2 seconds of stunning and 350 damages.

fields_data.name: Tortola Elder
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: Channels for at most 3 seconds then release a pulsing wave, dealing at most 300 magical damages to enemy units in its path.
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: Channels for at most 3 seconds then release a pulsing wave, dealing at most 500 magical damages to enemy units in its path.
fields_data.threestarChessSkill: Channels for at most 3 seconds then release a pulsing wave, dealing at most 800 magical damages to enemy units in its path.

fields_data.name: Soul Reaper
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: Deal 100 magical damages to enemy units and 100 heal to allied units in 3 radius.
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: Deal 150 magical damages to enemy units and 150 heal to allied units in 3 radius.
fields_data.threestarChessSkill: Deal 200 magical damages to enemy units and 200 heal to allied units in 3 radius.

fields_data.name: Doom Arbiter
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: Silence an enemy piece, dealing 60 pure damages in 10 seconds
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: Silence an enemy piece, dealing 90 pure damages in 15 seconds
fields_data.threestarChessSkill: Silence an enemy piece, dealing 120 pure damages in 20 seconds

fields_data.name: Grimtouch
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: Releases a forward ink wave, deals 100 Magical Damage to enemies along the path, each piece hit increases damage by 30, accompanied with 1x Ink Touch effect. Ink Touch: Target skill attack on any Ink Touched pieces would be imposed on all other directional Ink Touched pieces
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: Releases a forward ink wave, deals 150 Magical Damage to enemies along the path, each piece hit increases damage by 45, accompanied with 2x Ink Touch effect. Ink Touch: Target skill attack on any Ink Touched pieces would be imposed on all other directional Ink Touched pieces
fields_data.threestarChessSkill: Releases a forward ink wave, deals 200 Magical Damage to enemies along the path, each piece hit increases damage by 60, accompanied with 4x Ink Touch effect. Ink Touch: Target skill attack on any Ink Touched pieces would be imposed on all other directional Ink Touched pieces

fields_data.name: Sacred Lancer
fields_data.storyBackground: Skar'du was originally a weak person, the sickness is tormenting her body but unable to defeat her will. After receiving treatment from Desperate Doctor, she turned into a powerful warrior. She built her prestige in the army by that ancestral lance. That red short lance that belongs to her is a symbol of victory.
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: Feeds her Lance with blood, sacrificing 15 HP at each base attack, and multiple attacks will stack additional 20 Magic damage per second to the target, lasts 8 seconds; for each loss of 10% HP, increases 10% ATK speed, 10% Magic resistance and 0.5% HP regeneration per second.
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: Feeds her Lance with blood, sacrificing 15 HP at each base attack, and multiple attacks will stack additional 30 Magic damage per second to the target, lasts 8 seconds; for each loss of 10% HP, increases 15% ATK speed, 10% Magic resistance and 0.5% HP regeneration per second.
fields_data.threestarChessSkill: Feeds her Lance with blood, sacrificing 15 HP at each base attack, and multiple attacks will stack additional 50 Magic damage per second to the target, lasts 8 seconds; for each loss of 10% HP, increases 25% ATK speed, 10% Magic resistance and 0.5% HP regeneration per second.

fields_data.name: The Scryer
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: Active: Casts an ability based on the highest activated tier Class/Race Synergy of the enemy's lineup (with at least 3 chess pieces). Passive: Regenerates 10 Mana per second. When the first enemy's Mana is full, Silence it for 3 seconds. Mage/Shaman/Divinity: Electromagnetic Pulse, Warrior/Cave Clan/Goblin: Darkfeathered Servants, Mech/Warlock/Marine: Blood Surge, Hunter/Assassin/Glacier: Sonic Attack, Knight/Human/Egersis: Bolt of Lightning, Beast/Feathered/Demon: Earth's Fury, Druid/Spirit/Dragon: Whirlwind Attack
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: Active: Casts an ability based on the highest activated tier Class/Race Synergy of the enemy's lineup (with at least 3 chess pieces). Passive: Regenerates 10 Mana per second. When the first enemy's Mana is full, Silence it for 3 seconds. Mage/Shaman/Divinity: Electromagnetic Pulse, Warrior/Cave Clan/Goblin: Darkfeathered Servants, Mech/Warlock/Marine: Blood Surge, Hunter/Assassin/Glacier: Sonic Attack, Knight/Human/Egersis: Bolt of Lightning, Beast/Feathered/Demon: Earth's Fury, Druid/Spirit/Dragon: Whirlwind Attack
fields_data.threestarChessSkill: Active: Casts an ability based on the highest activated tier Class/Race Synergy of the enemy's lineup (with at least 3 chess pieces). Passive: Regenerates 10 Mana per second. When the first enemy's Mana is full, Silence it for 3 seconds. Mage/Shaman/Divinity: Electromagnetic Pulse, Warrior/Cave Clan/Goblin: Darkfeathered Servants, Mech/Warlock/Marine: Blood Surge, Hunter/Assassin/Glacier: Sonic Attack, Knight/Human/Egersis: Bolt of Lightning, Beast/Feathered/Demon: Earth's Fury, Druid/Spirit/Dragon: Whirlwind Attack

fields_data.name: Frostblaze Dragon
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: Builds an Icebound wall on your right, dealing 200 magical damage to enemy passing through the wall and reducing their attack speed by 30% for 3 seconds. All pieces won't target enemies on the other side of the wall.
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: Builds an Icebound wall on your right, dealing 300 magical damage to enemy passing through the wall and reducing their attack speed by 30% for 3 seconds. All pieces won't target enemies on the other side of the wall.
fields_data.threestarChessSkill: Builds an Icebound wall on your right, dealing 400 magical damage to enemy passing through the wall and reducing their attack speed by 30% for 3 seconds. All pieces won't target enemies on the other side of the wall.

fields_data.name: Strange Egg
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: If you need 1 piece to rank up your piece, drag the Strange Egg to the target piece, and it'll be whatever you want it to be.
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: If you need 1 piece to rank up your piece, drag the Strange Egg to the target piece, and it'll be whatever you want it to be.

fields_data.name: Helicopter
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: Call down 2 aerial missiles strike enemy units in 4 radius. Each of them deals 200 magical damages
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: Call down 2 aerial missiles strike enemy units in 4  radius. Each of them deals 300 magical damages
fields_data.threestarChessSkill: Call down 2 aerial missiles strike enemy units in 4 radius. Each of them deals 400 magical damages

fields_data.name: Devastator
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: Plant an explosive that will detonate after 3 seconds and deal 500 physical damages to enemy units in 4 radius.
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: Plant an explosive that will detonate after 3 seconds and deal 800 physical damages to enemy units in 4 radius.
fields_data.threestarChessSkill: Plant an explosive that will detonate after 3 seconds and deal 1100 physical damages to enemy units in 4 radius.

fields_data.name: Dark spirit
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: Deals pure damage equals to 4% of the max HP per second for enemy pieces within 3 grids. It lasts for 8 seconds.
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: Deals pure damage equals to 6% of the max HP per second for enemy pieces within 3 grids. It lasts for 8 seconds.
fields_data.threestarChessSkill: Deals pure damage equals to 8% of the max HP per second for enemy pieces within 3 grids. It lasts for 8 seconds.

fields_data.name: Tsunami Stalker
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: Slam the ground, causing the tentacles to erupt in all directions and in at most 3 radius, dealing 100 magical damages and stunning enemy units for 2 seconds.
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: Slam the ground, causing the tentacles to erupt in all directions and in at most 5 radius, dealing 200 magical damages and stunning enemy units for 2 seconds.
fields_data.threestarChessSkill: Slam the ground, causing the tentacles to erupt in all directions and in at most 6 radius, dealing 300 magical damages and stunning enemy units for 2 seconds.

fields_data.name: Blight Sorcerer
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: Release a blighted orb that bounce between enemy units up to 6 times, dealing 250 magical damages and slowing 65% enemy attack speed for 2.5 seconds.
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: Release a blighted orb that bounce between enemy units up to 9 times, dealing 350 magical damages and slowing 65% enemy attack speed for 2.5 seconds.
fields_data.threestarChessSkill: Release a blighted orb that bounce between enemy units up to 12 times, dealing 450 magical damages and slowing 65% enemy attack speed for 2.5 seconds.

fields_data.name: God of Thunder
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: Summons thunder to punish at least 1 enemy piece, and has a 50% chance of dealing 15% of the target piece's remaining HP +250 Magical damage equals to it.
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: Summons thunder to punish at least 1 enemy piece, and has a 50% chance of dealing 25% of the target piece's remaining HP +350 Magical damage equals to it.
fields_data.threestarChessSkill: Summons thunder to punish at least 1 enemy piece, and has a 50% chance of dealing 35% of the target piece's remaining HP +450 Magical damage equals to it.

fields_data.name: Egersis Prophet
fields_data.onestarChessSkill: Within 10 seconds, summons 1 Orb every 0.4 second that deals 150 physical damage to an enemy piece, gets HP regeneration equal to 25% of total damages dealt by the Orbs
fields_data.twostarChessSkill: Within 10 seconds, summons 1 Orb every 0.4 second that deals 225 physical damage to an enemy piece, gets HP regeneration equal to 25% of total damages dealt by the Orbs
fields_data.threestarChessSkill: Within 10 seconds, summons 1 Orb every 0.4 second that deals 300 physical damage to an enemy piece, gets HP regeneration equal to 25% of total damages dealt by the Orbs

fields_data.twostarChessSkill: Passive: Deals 50% splash physical damage to enemies within 2.5 grids. Active: All ally Demon pieces' attack increases by 200 for 60 seconds.
